sourcesContent:
<template>
  <MobileProfileView v-if="windowWidth < 992"></MobileProfileView>
</template>
<script>
import MobileProfileView from "@/components/MobileProfile.vue";

export default {
  name: "AboutView",
  components: {
    MobileProfileView,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      timelineItems: [
        {
          title: "Aim to your goals!",
          context: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.",
          color: "deep-purple-lighten-1",
        },
      ],
    };
  },
  computed: {
    windowWidth() {
      return this.$vuetify.display.width;
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style>
#user-img {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 350px;
  /*background: linear-gradient(to top, #00bcd4, white);*/
  /*background: conic-gradient(#00bcd4, white, #00bcd4);*/
}
#about-container {
  padding: 0px;
  margin: 0px;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  grid-template-rows: auto auto auto auto;
  grid-template-areas:
    "container-1"
    "container-2"
    "container-3"
    "container-4";
}
#about-container-1 {
  grid-area: container-1;
}
#about-container-2 {
  grid-area: container-2;
}
#about-container-3 {
  grid-area: container-3;
}
#about-container-4 {
  grid-area: container-4;
}
</style>
